20101222070010.000|20101222070011.000|CC1|TAVIS: GOOD EVENING.            
20101222070011.000|20101222070013.000|CC1|FROM LOS ANGELES, I AM TAVIS    
20101222070013.000|20101222070016.000|CC1|SMILEY.                         
20101222070016.000|20101222070017.000|CC1|TONIGHT, MY CONVERSATION WITH A 
20101222070017.000|20101222070019.000|CC1|LEGISLATE -- A LEGENDARY        
20101222070019.000|20101222070028.000|CC1|MUSICIAN, PATTI SMIKTH.         
20101222070028.000|20101222070030.000|CC1|-- SMITH.                       
20101222070030.000|20101222070035.000|CC1|SHE RELEASED A BOOK WHICH WON AN
20101222070035.000|20101222070036.000|CC1|AWARD FOR NON-FICTION.          
20101222070036.000|20101222070041.000|CC1|"JUST KIDS."                    
20101222070041.000|20101222070042.000|CC1|MY CONVERSATION WITH MUSIC      
20101222070042.000|20101222070047.000|CC1|LEGEND PATTI SMITH, COMING UP   
20101222070047.000|20101222070049.000|CC1|RIGHT NOW.                      
20101222070049.000|20101222070050.000|CC1|>> ALL I KNOW IS HIS NAME IS    
20101222070050.000|20101222070051.000|CC1|JAMES, AND HE NEEDS EXTRA HELP  
20101222070051.000|20101222070052.000|CC1|WITH HIS READING.               
20101222070052.000|20101222070052.000|CC1|>> I AM JAMES.                  
20101222070052.000|20101222070053.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101222070053.000|20101222070053.000|CC1|>> TO EVERYONE MAKING A         
20101222070053.000|20101222070054.000|CC1|DIFFERENCE --                   
20101222070054.000|20101222070055.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.                   
20101222070055.000|20101222070056.000|CC1|>> YOU HELP US ALL LIVE BETTER. 
20101222070056.000|20101222070057.000|CC1|>> NATIONWIDE INSURANCE SUPPORTS
20101222070057.000|20101222070057.000|CC1|TAVIS SMILEY.                   
20101222070057.000|20101222070058.000|CC1|WITH EVERY QUESTION AND EVERY   
20101222070058.000|20101222070100.000|CC1|ANSWER, NATIONWIDE INSURANCE IS 
20101222070100.000|20101222070101.000|CC1|PROUD TO JOIN TAVIS IN WORKING  
20101222070101.000|20101222070104.000|CC1|TO IMPROVE FINANCIAL LITERACY   
20101222070104.000|20101222070105.000|CC1|AND REMOVE OBSTACLES TO ECONOMIC
20101222070105.000|20101222070106.000|CC1|EMPOWERMENT, ONE CONVERSATION   
20101222070106.000|20101222070107.000|CC1|AT A TIME.                      
20101222070107.000|20101222070110.000|CC1|NATIONWIDE IS ON YOUR SIDE.     
20101222070110.000|20101222070112.000|CC1|>> AND BY CONTRIBUTIONS TO YOUR 
20101222070112.000|20101222070113.000|CC1|PBS STATION FROM VIEWERS LIKE   
20101222070113.000|20101222070116.000|CC1|YOU.                            
20101222070116.000|20101222070118.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20101222070118.000|20101222070119.000|CC1|[CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY    
20101222070119.000|20101222070136.000|CC1|KCET PUBLIC TELEVISION]         
20101222070136.000|20101222070141.000|CC1|TAVIS: I AM PLEASED TO WELCOME  
20101222070141.000|20101222070142.000|CC1|PATTI SMITH TO THIS PROGRAM.    
20101222070142.000|20101222070144.000|CC1|THE LEGENDARY PERFORMER HAS JUST
20101222070144.000|20101222070151.000|CC1|RELEASED "JUST KIDS," A HEART   
20101222070151.000|20101222070155.000|CC1|FELT MEMOIR.                    
20101222070155.000|20101222070158.000|CC1|IT IS AN HONOR TO HAVE YOU ON   
20101222070158.000|20101222070158.000|CC1|THIS PROGRAM.                   
20101222070158.000|20101222070200.000|CC1|>> THANKS.                      
20101222070200.000|20101222070205.000|CC1|TAVIS: FIRST OF ALL, PUT THAT   
20101222070205.000|20101222070207.000|CC1|PICTURE BACKUP OF THE COVER.    
20101222070207.000|20101222070209.000|CC1|I WANT YOU TO TELL ME ABOUT THIS
20101222070209.000|20101222070214.000|CC1|VOTE -- PHOTO.                  
20101222070214.000|20101222070216.000|CC1|TELL ME ABOUT IT.               
20101222070216.000|20101222070219.000|CC1|>> WELL, IT WAS -- ROBERT AND I 
20101222070219.000|20101222070224.000|CC1|MET IN 1967, SO THIS WAS OUR    
20101222070224.000|20101222070229.000|CC1|ANNIVERSARY, SEPTEMBER 1, 1969. 
20101222070229.000|20101222070231.000|CC1|WE WANTED TO GO TO CONEY ISLAND 
20101222070231.000|20101222070232.000|CC1|FOR OUR ANNIVERSARY.            
20101222070232.000|20101222070235.000|CC1|WE BOTH LOVED CONEY ISLAND, AND 
20101222070235.000|20101222070239.000|CC1|IN THE BACK, IN FACT, WHEN I SAW
20101222070239.000|20101222070242.000|CC1|THE PICTURE, I SAW THE WORD     
20101222070242.000|20101222070248.000|CC1|"HEROES," AND I SAID, "IS THAT  
20101222070248.000|20101222070248.000|CC1|NOT A GREAT?"                   
20101222070248.000|20101222070254.000|CC1|AND HE SAID, "PATTI, A HEROE IS 
20101222070254.000|20101222070259.000|CC1|A SANDWICH."                    
20101222070259.000|20101222070303.000|CC1|[LAUGHTER]                      
20101222070303.000|20101222070307.000|CC1|THAT PICTURE DOCUMENTED A VERY  
20101222070307.000|20101222070312.000|CC1|HAPPY DAY FOR ROBERT AND I, AND 
20101222070312.000|20101222070314.000|CC1|WHEN I LOOK AT IT, IT STILL     
20101222070314.000|20101222070315.000|CC1|MAKES ME HAPPY.                 
20101222070315.000|20101222070319.000|CC1|TAVIS: YOU TALK ABOUT EARLIER IN
20101222070319.000|20101222070322.000|CC1|YOUR CAREER, AT ONE POINT, THERE
20101222070322.000|20101222070323.000|CC1|WAS AN ATTEMPT BY THE RECORD    
20101222070323.000|20101222070327.000|CC1|INDUSTRY TO MAKE YOU A HARDER   
20101222070327.000|20101222070332.000|CC1|EDGED VERISON OF CHER.          
20101222070332.000|20101222070335.000|CC1|>> THAT WAS AN EARLIER RECORD   
20101222070335.000|20101222070341.000|CC1|COMPANY IN 1971.                
20101222070341.000|20101222070343.000|CC1|QUITE A GOOD DEAL, QUITE A LOT  
20101222070343.000|20101222070346.000|CC1|OF MONEY.                       
20101222070346.000|20101222070349.000|CC1|I WAS NOT REALLY INTERESTED IN  
20101222070349.000|20101222070354.000|CC1|THAT, SO IN 1975, I WENT WITH   
20101222070354.000|20101222070358.000|CC1|CLIVE DAVIS, WHO HAD HIS OWN    
20101222070358.000|20101222070404.000|CC1|IDEA ABOUT ME, BUT CLIVE ALWAYS 
20101222070404.000|20101222070406.000|CC1|HAD A WEAKNESS FOR ARTISTS LIKE 
20101222070406.000|20101222070407.000|CC1|MYSELF.                         
20101222070407.000|20101222070409.000|CC1|THEY WERE TALKING MORE THAT THEY
20101222070409.000|20101222070410.000|CC1|WANTED ME TO WEAR SOMETHING LIKE
20101222070410.000|20101222070415.000|CC1|A MOTORCYCLE JACKET AND SING    
20101222070415.000|20101222070417.000|CC1|ROCK-AND-ROLL SONGS, BUT IN     
20101222070417.000|20101222070419.000|CC1|1971, I WAS NOT READY FOR THAT. 
20101222070419.000|20101222070421.000|CC1|I DID THAT IN MY OWN TIME.      
20101222070421.000|20101222070427.000|CC1|TAVIS: THIS IS ONE OF THE MOST  
20101222070427.000|20101222070427.000|CC1|BEAUTIFULLY WRITTEN --          
20101222070427.000|20101222070430.000|CC1|>> OH, THANK YOU.               
20101222070430.000|20101222070435.000|CC1|TAVIS: YOU ARE A POET,          
20101222070435.000|20101222070436.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY, BUT YOU'RE WRITING --
20101222070436.000|20101222070440.000|CC1|THERE IS A FLOW TO IT -- BUT    
20101222070440.000|20101222070445.000|CC1|YOUR WRITING, THERE IS A FLOW TO
20101222070445.000|20101222070448.000|CC1|IT.                             
20101222070448.000|20101222070449.000|CC1|>> I ONLY WROTE ABOUT THINGS I  
20101222070449.000|20101222070450.000|CC1|LOVED IN THE BOOK.              
20101222070450.000|20101222070452.000|CC1|I DID NOT WASTE MY TIME WRITING 
20101222070452.000|20101222070454.000|CC1|ABOUT THINGS THAT I DID NOT     
20101222070454.000|20101222070454.000|CC1|LOVE.                           
20101222070454.000|20101222070459.000|CC1|PEOPLE AROUND US.               
20101222070459.000|20101222070501.000|CC1|AND I THINK WHEN YOU HAVE LOVE  
20101222070501.000|20101222070506.000|CC1|AND MAGIC COMPELLING YOU, --    
20101222070506.000|20101222070516.000|CC1|TAVIS: EVEN THE WAY YOU TALK, IT
20101222070516.000|20101222070516.000|CC1|IS POETIC.                      
20101222070516.000|20101222070518.000|CC1|IT IS JUST A BEAUTIFUL THING.   
20101222070518.000|20101222070524.000|CC1|"LOVE AND MAGIC COMPELLING YOU."
20101222070524.000|20101222070526.000|CC1|I WANT TO ASK YOU WHY IT IS YOU 
20101222070526.000|20101222070528.000|CC1|THINK THERE IS SOMETHING FOR US 
20101222070528.000|20101222070532.000|CC1|TO LEARN OR TO MARINADE ON ABOUT
20101222070532.000|20101222070533.000|CC1|YOUR RELATIONSHIP, BUT FIRST,   
20101222070533.000|20101222070536.000|CC1|TELL ME ABOUT ROBERT -- OR TO   
20101222070536.000|20101222070552.000|CC1|--                              
20101222070552.000|20101222070554.000|CC1|>> HE WAS AN ARTIST.            
20101222070554.000|20101222070556.000|CC1|THOSE ARE THE SIMPLEST WORDS I  
20101222070556.000|20101222070558.000|CC1|CAN USE TO DESCRIBE ROBERT.     
20101222070558.000|20101222070601.000|CC1|NOT A PHOTOGRAPHER.             
20101222070601.000|20101222070603.000|CC1|ALL OF THE DIFFERENT ADJECTIVES 
20101222070603.000|20101222070606.000|CC1|USED FOR HIM CAN BE DISTILLED   
20101222070606.000|20101222070608.000|CC1|DOWN TO SAY THAT HE WAS A TRUE  
20101222070608.000|20101222070610.000|CC1|ARTIST.                         
20101222070610.000|20101222070612.000|CC1|ONE THING I HOPE THE BOOK WILL  
20101222070612.000|20101222070616.000|CC1|DO IS, ONE, I PROMISED ROBERT   
20101222070616.000|20101222070618.000|CC1|THAT I WOULD WRITE THIS BOOK    
20101222070618.000|20101222070619.000|CC1|BEFORE I DIED.                  
20101222070619.000|20101222070623.000|CC1|-- BEFORE HE DIED -- BEFORE I   
20101222070623.000|20101222070624.000|CC1|DIED.                           
20101222070624.000|20101222070625.000|CC1|I PROMISED HIM I WOULD WRITE OUR
20101222070625.000|20101222070628.000|CC1|STORY.                          
20101222070628.000|20101222070630.000|CC1|SOMETIMES, WHEN YOU ARE WRITING 
20101222070630.000|20101222070632.000|CC1|POETRY, YOU ARE DOING SOMETHING 
20101222070632.000|20101222070634.000|CC1|VERY OBSCURE, AND YOU ARE NOT SO
20101222070634.000|20101222070635.000|CC1|CONCERNED WITH THE LISTENER OR  
20101222070635.000|20101222070638.000|CC1|THE READER.                     
20101222070638.000|20101222070640.000|CC1|I WAS HOPING THAT THIS BOOK     
20101222070640.000|20101222070641.000|CC1|MIGHT INSPIRE PEOPLE AND GIVE   
20101222070641.000|20101222070642.000|CC1|THEM HOPE.                      
20101222070642.000|20101222070645.000|CC1|IT IS ABOUT TWO YOUNG PEOPLE WHO
20101222070645.000|20101222070646.000|CC1|STARTED WITH NOTHING BUT        
20101222070646.000|20101222070651.000|CC1|BELIEVED IN EACH OTHER.         
20101222070651.000|20101222070652.000|CC1|EVERYTHING ROBERT HAD TO GO     
20101222070652.000|20101222070657.000|CC1|THROUGH, THE AWAKENING OF       
20101222070657.000|20101222070658.000|CC1|HOMOSEXUALITY, AND HOW WE HAD TO
20101222070658.000|20101222070703.000|CC1|DEAL WITH BAD -- WITH THAT AS   
20101222070703.000|20101222070705.000|CC1|LOVERS AND FRIENDS, STRUGGLING, 
20101222070705.000|20101222070709.000|CC1|NOT HAVING THINGS TO EACH.      
20101222070709.000|20101222070711.000|CC1|I AM JUST HOPING IT WILL BE     
20101222070711.000|20101222070720.000|CC1|HELPFUL TO NEW GENERATIONS, AND 
20101222070720.000|20101222070722.000|CC1|MAYBE NICE MEMORIES BRING OUT   
20101222070722.000|20101222070724.000|CC1|NICE MEMORIES FOR THE OLDER     
20101222070724.000|20101222070724.000|CC1|GENERATION.                     
20101222070724.000|20101222070729.000|CC1|TAVIS: I APPRECIATE THAT.       
20101222070729.000|20101222070732.000|CC1|TELL ME HOW YOU NAVIGATED JUST  
20101222070732.000|20101222070733.000|CC1|APPEAR NATURE OF THE            
20101222070733.000|20101222070734.000|CC1|RELATIONSHIP.                   
20101222070734.000|20101222070736.000|CC1|YOU STARTED AS FRIENDS.         
20101222070736.000|20101222070741.000|CC1|-- JUST THE PURE NATURE OF THE  
20101222070741.000|20101222070741.000|CC1|RELATIONSHIP.                   
20101222070741.000|20101222070743.000|CC1|THE ROLLER-COASTER OF THE       
20101222070743.000|20101222070743.000|CC1|RELATIONSHIP.                   
20101222070743.000|20101222070746.000|CC1|>> WELL, ROBERT AND I STARTED   
20101222070746.000|20101222070748.000|CC1|ALMOST IMMEDIATELY AS BOYFRIEND 
20101222070748.000|20101222070750.000|CC1|AND GIRLFRIEND.                 
20101222070750.000|20101222070752.000|CC1|IN 1967, WE DID NOT EVEN USE THE
20101222070752.000|20101222070754.000|CC1|TERM "LOVERS."                  
20101222070754.000|20101222070757.000|CC1|HE WAS MY BOYFRIEND.            
20101222070757.000|20101222070759.000|CC1|WE HAD A VERY CLASSIC,          
20101222070759.000|20101222070801.000|CC1|TRADITIONAL RELATIONSHIP,       
20101222070801.000|20101222070804.000|CC1|PHYSICALLY AND EMOTIONALLY.     
20101222070804.000|20101222070805.000|CC1|WE WERE TOGETHER.               
20101222070805.000|20101222070808.000|CC1|BUT AFTER ABOUT 1.5 YEARS OR ONE
20101222070808.000|20101222070814.000|CC1|YEAR, ROBERT -- ANY FEELINGS HE 
20101222070814.000|20101222070818.000|CC1|HAD, YOU KNOW, ABOUT HIS NATURE 
20101222070818.000|20101222070819.000|CC1|HE HAD EITHER SUPPRESSED BECAUSE
20101222070819.000|20101222070822.000|CC1|HE WAS A CATHOLIC BOY, AN ALTAR 
20101222070822.000|20101222070830.000|CC1|BOY -- HE WAS IN ROTC, A        
20101222070830.000|20101222070833.000|CC1|MILITARY MAN WAS HIS FATHER.    
20101222070833.000|20101222070834.000|CC1|PEOPLE WERE STILL KEEPING THEIR 
20101222070834.000|20101222070839.000|CC1|PERSUASIONS HIDDEN, AND IT JUST 
20101222070839.000|20101222070840.000|CC1|GOT TO THE POINT WHERE HE COULD 
20101222070840.000|20101222070841.000|CC1|NOT HIDE IT OR SUPPRESS IT      
20101222070841.000|20101222070844.000|CC1|ANYMORE, BUT HE REALLY DID NOT  
20101222070844.000|20101222070845.000|CC1|WANT US TO BREAK UP.            
20101222070845.000|20101222070847.000|CC1|WE WERE REALLY HAPPY WITH ONE   
20101222070847.000|20101222070850.000|CC1|ANOTHER, AND IT CAUSED US A     
20101222070850.000|20101222070854.000|CC1|CERTAIN AMOUNT OF PAIN.         
20101222070854.000|20101222070856.000|CC1|WE HAD OUR NORMAL -- IT WAS NOT 
20101222070856.000|20101222070858.000|CC1|WHERE WE WERE FIGHTING OR       
20101222070858.000|20101222070906.000|CC1|YELLING AT EACH OTHER.          
20101222070906.000|20101222070912.000|CC1|HE EVEN, TO HIS CREDIT, IN 1969,
20101222070912.000|20101222070914.000|CC1|AFTER EXPLORING, YOU KNOW, ALL  
20101222070914.000|20101222070918.000|CC1|ASPECTS OF HIS DESIRES REALLY   
20101222070918.000|20101222070921.000|CC1|WANTED US TO TRY AGAIN, AND WE  
20101222070921.000|20101222070925.000|CC1|TRIED AGAIN FOR ALMOST A YEAR,  
20101222070925.000|20101222070927.000|CC1|BUT HE WAS WHO HE WAS.          
20101222070927.000|20101222070930.000|CC1|HIS NATURE WAS WHAT IT WAS, BUT 
20101222070930.000|20101222070931.000|CC1|WE HAD SOMETHING SO BEAUTIFUL   
20101222070931.000|20101222070935.000|CC1|WORTH SAVING.                   
20101222070935.000|20101222070937.000|CC1|THE PHYSICAL ASPECT OF A        
20101222070937.000|20101222070939.000|CC1|RELATIONSHIP IS BEAUTIFUL, BUT  
20101222070939.000|20101222070941.000|CC1|WE HAD SOMETHING THAT WAS SO    
20101222070941.000|20101222070944.000|CC1|MUCH MORE ENDURING THAT I STILL 
20101222070944.000|20101222070944.000|CC1|HAVE.                           
20101222070944.000|20101222070950.000|CC1|TAVIS: MM-HMM.                  
20101222070950.000|20101222070952.000|CC1|>> I STILL FEEL THE CONFIDENCE  
20101222070952.000|20101222070954.000|CC1|THAT HE GAVE ME, THINGS THAT I  
20101222070954.000|20101222070956.000|CC1|LEARNED ABOUT MYSELF AND BEING  
20101222070956.000|20101222070959.000|CC1|AN ARTIST.                      
20101222070959.000|20101222071005.000|CC1|SO, YOU KNOW, IT TOOK A LOT OF  
20101222071005.000|20101222071005.000|CC1|MUTUAL HELP.                    
20101222071005.000|20101222071011.000|CC1|WE HELPED EACH OTHER TO RIDE    
20101222071011.000|20101222071013.000|CC1|THESE THINGS, BUT THE FACT OF   
20101222071013.000|20101222071016.000|CC1|THE MATTER WAS IS THAT WE HAVE A
20101222071016.000|20101222071017.000|CC1|LOT MORE THAN THE PHYSICAL      
20101222071017.000|20101222071018.000|CC1|RELATIONSHIP.                   
20101222071018.000|20101222071023.000|CC1|TAVIS: IT GOT REALLY            
20101222071023.000|20101222071023.000|CC1|INTERESTING.                    
20101222071023.000|20101222071025.000|CC1|I AM TRYING TO IMAGINE HOW I    
20101222071025.000|20101222071028.000|CC1|WOULD FEEL IN A RELATIONSHIP    
20101222071028.000|20101222071030.000|CC1|WITH A WOMAN THAT I ABSOLUTELY  
20101222071030.000|20101222071035.000|CC1|ADORED AND LOVED AND DISCOVERED 
20101222071035.000|20101222071040.000|CC1|THAT SHE WAS A LESBIAN AND WAS  
20101222071040.000|20101222071042.000|CC1|LEADING ME FOR ANOTHER WOMAN.   
20101222071042.000|20101222071051.000|CC1|-- LEAVING ME FOR ANOTHER WOMAN.
20101222071051.000|20101222071059.000|CC1|>> ONE CANNOT FORGET THAT I WAS 
20101222071059.000|20101222071101.000|CC1|THE ONLY PERSON THAT SUFFERED.  
20101222071101.000|20101222071102.000|CC1|SOMETIMES I THINK IT WAS MORE   
20101222071102.000|20101222071105.000|CC1|PAINFUL FOR ROBERT.             
20101222071105.000|20101222071111.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, OF COURSE, IT WAS A   
20101222071111.000|20101222071113.000|CC1|STRAIN FOR HIM TO BE ABLE TO    
20101222071113.000|20101222071117.000|CC1|EXPRESS HIS DEEPER NATURE, BUT, 
20101222071117.000|20101222071120.000|CC1|BELIEVE ME, HE SUFFERED AS MUCH 
20101222071120.000|20101222071121.000|CC1|AS I DID.                       
20101222071121.000|20101222071135.000|CC1|IT WAS NOT A SIMPLE THING, BUT  
20101222071135.000|20101222071140.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE HAD A DEEP COMMUNE AS
20101222071140.000|20101222071141.000|CC1|ARTISTS AND HELPED EACH OTHER   
20101222071141.000|20101222071143.000|CC1|EVOLVES AS HUMAN BEINGS, WE WERE
20101222071143.000|20101222071145.000|CC1|ABLE TO SURMOUNT IT.            
20101222071145.000|20101222071147.000|CC1|IF WE HAD NOT HAD THAT, PERHAPS 
20101222071147.000|20101222071149.000|CC1|WE WOULD HAVE TOTALLY GONE OUR  
20101222071149.000|20101222071149.000|CC1|SEPARATE WAYS.                  
20101222071149.000|20101222071154.000|CC1|TAVIS: THERE IS A BEAUTIFUL     
20101222071154.000|20101222071156.000|CC1|PHRASE THAT YOU UTTERED THAT I  
20101222071156.000|20101222071158.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN HOLDING ON TO SINCE I 
20101222071158.000|20101222071200.000|CC1|DISCOVERED A FEW WEEKS AGO, AND 
20101222071200.000|20101222071202.000|CC1|THAT IS THAT EACH OF US HAS TO  
20101222071202.000|20101222071206.000|CC1|DIG DOWN, DOWN, DOWN AND FIND   
20101222071206.000|20101222071207.000|CC1|THE CONFIDENT PART.             
20101222071207.000|20101222071207.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101222071207.000|20101222071212.000|CC1|TAVIS: TELL ME MORE ABOUT THAT. 
20101222071212.000|20101222071217.000|CC1|>> I HAVE ALWAYS LOVED ART.     
20101222071217.000|20101222071220.000|CC1|I WAS SKINNY.                   
20101222071220.000|20101222071227.000|CC1|I GREW UP IN RURAL SOUTH JERSEY.
20101222071227.000|20101222071233.000|CC1|I HAD BAD SKIN AND GREASY -- I  
20101222071233.000|20101222071237.000|CC1|WAS NOT POPULAR WITH THE BOYS.  
20101222071237.000|20101222071239.000|CC1|ROBERT WAS A GIFTED DRAFTSMAN,  
20101222071239.000|20101222071243.000|CC1|VERY GIFTED.                    
20101222071243.000|20101222071245.000|CC1|I STRUGGLED WITH MY POEMS.      
20101222071245.000|20101222071248.000|CC1|I STRUGGLED WITH MY DRAWING.    
20101222071248.000|20101222071250.000|CC1|I WAS SORT OF SELF-CONSCIOUS,   
20101222071250.000|20101222071253.000|CC1|AND ROBERT, HE WAS SHY AND      
20101222071253.000|20101222071254.000|CC1|SOMETIMES INARTICULATE, BUT HE  
20101222071254.000|20101222071257.000|CC1|DID NOT LACK CONFIDENCE, AND    
20101222071257.000|20101222071302.000|CC1|ROBERT WOULD NOT REST UNTIL HE  
20101222071302.000|20101222071304.000|CC1|INSTILLED THE CONFIDENCE THAT HE
20101222071304.000|20101222071306.000|CC1|HAD IN HIMSELF IN ME, AND HIS   
20101222071306.000|20101222071307.000|CC1|BELIEF IN HIMSELF WAS SO        
20101222071307.000|20101222071311.000|CC1|UNSHAKABLE, AND HE EQUATED HIS  
20101222071311.000|20101222071316.000|CC1|BELIEF IN THE EQUALLY, SO IT    
20101222071316.000|20101222071322.000|CC1|SOUNDS -- EVENTUALLY, HE WAS    
20101222071322.000|20101222071324.000|CC1|SUCCESSFUL IN MAKING ME FEEL    
20101222071324.000|20101222071325.000|CC1|LIKE I WAS REALLY WORTH         
20101222071325.000|20101222071329.000|CC1|SOMETHING, THAT I WAS NOT BEING 
20101222071329.000|20101222071334.000|CC1|A MUSE AS A BEAUTIFUL THING, BUT
20101222071334.000|20101222071338.000|CC1|HE WAS BOTH MUSE AND MAKER.     
20101222071338.000|20101222071341.000|CC1|I HAVE NEVER LOST IT.           
20101222071341.000|20101222071345.000|CC1|I HAVE HAD TRAGEDY IN MY LIFE.  
20101222071345.000|20101222071347.000|CC1|I HAVE NOT WANTED TO GET OUT OF 
20101222071347.000|20101222071347.000|CC1|BED.                            
20101222071347.000|20101222071349.000|CC1|I HAVE GONE THROUGH A LOT OF    
20101222071349.000|20101222071351.000|CC1|DIFFICULT THINGS, BUT I NEVER   
20101222071351.000|20101222071353.000|CC1|LOST THAT CONFIDENCE THAT HE    
20101222071353.000|20101222071356.000|CC1|INSTILLED IN ME, AND RIGHT NOW, 
20101222071356.000|20101222071357.000|CC1|IT IS BLOSSOMING.               
20101222071357.000|20101222071401.000|CC1|TAVIS: YOUR COMMENT A MOMENT AGO
20101222071401.000|20101222071403.000|CC1|THAT THERE WERE DAYS WHEN YOU   
20101222071403.000|20101222071404.000|CC1|FELT LIKE YOU DID NOT WANT TO   
20101222071404.000|20101222071407.000|CC1|GET OUT OF BED.                 
20101222071407.000|20101222071408.000|CC1|I'M FASCINATED BY YOUR          
20101222071408.000|20101222071411.000|CC1|CONFESSION THAT THE DAY, I AM   
20101222071411.000|20101222071414.000|CC1|PARAPHRASING, A DAY IS NOT      
20101222071414.000|20101222071415.000|CC1|COMPLETE FOR YOU UNLESS YOU     
20101222071415.000|20101222071418.000|CC1|CREATE SOMETHING, SO BEFORE YOU 
20101222071418.000|20101222071419.000|CC1|GO TO BED, YOU HAVE TO LOOK OUT 
20101222071419.000|20101222071421.000|CC1|ON THAT DAY AND SEE SOMETHING   
20101222071421.000|20101222071422.000|CC1|THAT YOU HAVE CREATED IN THAT   
20101222071422.000|20101222071423.000|CC1|DAY.                            
20101222071423.000|20101222071426.000|CC1|>> I HAVE JUST BEEN LIKE THAT   
20101222071426.000|20101222071428.000|CC1|SINCE I WAS REALLY YOUNG.       
20101222071428.000|20101222071430.000|CC1|IT IS ALMOST AS IF I MADE A VOW 
20101222071430.000|20101222071431.000|CC1|TO MYSELF.                      
20101222071431.000|20101222071433.000|CC1|I HAVE TO DO SOMETHING EVERY DAY
20101222071433.000|20101222071436.000|CC1|TO SORT OF PROVES MY WORDS,     
20101222071436.000|20101222071438.000|CC1|BECAUSE EVEN THOUGH -- TO PROVE 
20101222071438.000|20101222071442.000|CC1|MY -- I HAVE TO DO SOMETHING    
20101222071442.000|20101222071447.000|CC1|EVERY DAY TO SORT OF PROVE MY   
20101222071447.000|20101222071449.000|CC1|WORTH.

20101222071452.000|20101222071457.000|CC1|SHOW SOME HUMAN WORTH, SOMETHING
20101222071457.000|20101222071459.000|CC1|I HAVE DONE, YOU KNOW, IF I HAVE
20101222071459.000|20101222071500.000|CC1|NOT DONE SOMETHING POLITICALLY  
20101222071500.000|20101222071503.000|CC1|TO HELP MY FELLOW MAN, AT LEAST 
20101222071503.000|20101222071504.000|CC1|I HAVE TAKEN AN INTERESTING     
20101222071504.000|20101222071508.000|CC1|PHOTOGRAPH.                     
20101222071508.000|20101222071510.000|CC1|THESE GIFTS I HAVE BEEN GIVEN,

20101222071512.000|20101222071514.000|CC1|GIVEN, HOWEVER YOU WANT TO      
20101222071514.000|20101222071516.000|CC1|DESCRIBE GOD, WHETHER IT IS

20101222071528.000|20101222071531.000|CC1|LEAST EXPRESS SOMETHING THAT

20101222071607.000|20101222071613.000|CC1|-- GOD A MOMENT AGO.            
20101222071613.000|20101222071615.000|CC1|WHEN YOU SAY THAT EACH OF US HAS
20101222071615.000|20101222071617.000|CC1|A CAPACITY TO AN MAY GOD, WHAT

20101222071634.000|20101222071637.000|CC1|BEING A POET OR A TRUE ARTIST IS

20101222071654.000|20101222071656.000|CC1|WHETHER IT IS NATURE OR GOD,    
20101222071656.000|20101222071700.000|CC1|WHATEVER YOU WANT TO CALL IT.   
20101222071700.000|20101222071702.000|CC1|ROCK-AND-ROLL IS THE ONE ARE TO 
20101222071702.000|20101222071704.000|CC1|THAT AMERICA HAS GIVEN THE      
20101222071704.000|20101222071704.000|CC1|WORLD.

20101222071709.000|20101222071716.000|CC1|GIVEN THE WORLD.                
20101222071716.000|20101222071718.000|CC1|TO WRITE A SONG OR TO FEEL IT OR

20101222071730.000|20101222071732.000|CC1|THERE WAS A POINT IN YOUR       
20101222071732.000|20101222071734.000|CC1|CAREER, AND I WILL GO BACK TO   
20101222071734.000|20101222071735.000|CC1|THE EARLY POINT OF YOUR CAREER

20101222071739.000|20101222071744.000|CC1|POINT IN YOUR CAREER WHERE YOU  
20101222071744.000|20101222071748.000|CC1|BASICALLY SAID, "I AM NOT       
20101222071748.000|20101222071751.000|CC1|SELLING OUT.

20101222071755.000|20101222071757.000|CC1|FOR FREEDOM."                   
20101222071757.000|20101222071759.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101222071759.000|20101222071804.000|CC1|TAVIS: IS SOUL MUSIC ANOTHER    
20101222071804.000|20101222071805.000|CC1|FORM OF FREEDOM?                
20101222071805.000|20101222071811.000|CC1|>> YES, IT APPLIES TO ANY MUSIC.
20101222071811.000|20101222071815.000|CC1|BECAUSE I HAVE A SUCCESS WITH   
20101222071815.000|20101222071818.000|CC1|THE SONG THAT I WORKED WITH     
20101222071818.000|20101222071822.000|CC1|BRUCE ON, PEOPLE WOULD SAY, "OH,
20101222071822.000|20101222071827.000|CC1|YOU SOLD OUT," AND I THOUGHT

20101222071849.000|20101222071854.000|CC1|PHRASES, INCLUDING "PUNK ROCK." 
20101222071854.000|20101222071857.000|CC1|I WILL DO WHAT I WANT, NOT      
20101222071857.000|20101222071859.000|CC1|WITHOUT CONSCIENCE OR WITHOUT A 
20101222071859.000|20101222071902.000|CC1|SENSE OF RESPONSIBILITY, BUT I  
20101222071902.000|20101222071904.000|CC1|WANT TO DO WITH THE WAY I SEE   
20101222071904.000|20101222071904.000|CC1|FIT.                            
20101222071904.000|20101222071909.000|CC1|TAVIS: I AM TRYING TO INTIMATE  
20101222071909.000|20101222071916.000|CC1|-- ANIMATE THAT IN MY OWN LIFE. 
20101222071916.000|20101222071919.000|CC1|WHEN DID YOU REALLY FEEL LIKE   
20101222071919.000|20101222071923.000|CC1|YOU WERE MOVING AT THE PACE YOU 
20101222071923.000|20101222071924.000|CC1|WANTED TO?                      
20101222071924.000|20101222071925.000|CC1|ROBERT TEASE YOU ABOUT THE FACT 
20101222071925.000|20101222071928.000|CC1|THAT YOU BECAME FAMOUS FIRST -- 
20101222071928.000|20101222071932.000|CC1|ROBERT TEASED YOU.              
20101222071932.000|20101222071936.000|CC1|>> WELL, I AM NOT A MUSICIAN.   
20101222071936.000|20101222071940.000|CC1|I AM A PERFORMER.               
20101222071940.000|20101222071941.000|CC1|AND, YOU KNOW, IN THE COURSE OF 
20101222071941.000|20101222071942.000|CC1|PERFORMING, I HAVE LEARNED TO   
20101222071942.000|20101222071944.000|CC1|SING, AND I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD  
20101222071944.000|20101222071947.000|CC1|YEAR, BUT I DO NOT CALL MYSELF A
20101222071947.000|20101222071949.000|CC1|MUSICIAN -- I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD
20101222071949.000|20101222071949.000|CC1|EAR.

20101222071957.000|20101222071958.000|CC1|ESTHETICALLY POLITICAL.         
20101222071958.000|20101222072000.000|CC1|WHAT I WANTED TO DO WAS MERGE   
20101222072000.000|20101222072003.000|CC1|POETRY WITH ROCK AND ROLL IN THE
20101222072003.000|20101222072005.000|CC1|WAY THAT JIMMY HENDRIX OR JIM   
20101222072005.000|20101222072010.000|CC1|MORRISON OR BOB DYLAN HAD.      
20101222072010.000|20101222072011.000|CC1|I WANTED TO CONTINUE THAT

20101222072017.000|20101222072025.000|CC1|JIMI HENDRIX DID.               
20101222072025.000|20101222072027.000|CC1|AND I WANTED TO HELP REMIND     
20101222072027.000|20101222072029.000|CC1|PEOPLE THAT ROCK-AND-ROLL WAS   
20101222072029.000|20101222072033.000|CC1|OUR COUNTRY FULL VOICE --       
20101222072033.000|20101222072034.000|CC1|CULTURAL VOICE AND THAT WE COULD
20101222072034.000|20101222072039.000|CC1|ALL ANIMATE THAT ASPECT OF      
20101222072039.000|20101222072041.000|CC1|OURSELVES.                      
20101222072041.000|20101222072043.000|CC1|I THOUGHT I HAD ACHIEVED THAT   
20101222072043.000|20101222072047.000|CC1|ALREADY IN "HORSES.'            
20101222072047.000|20101222072048.000|CC1|"                               
20101222072048.000|20101222072053.000|CC1|CLIVE DAVIS HAD OFFERED ME TO DO
20101222072053.000|20101222072055.000|CC1|MORE RECORDS, AND HE BELIEVED IN
20101222072055.000|20101222072057.000|CC1|WHAT I WAS DOING.               
20101222072057.000|20101222072104.000|CC1|I WOUND UP DOING A FEW MORE.    
20101222072104.000|20101222072106.000|CC1|CERTAINLY BY EASTER, I HAD      
20101222072106.000|20101222072107.000|CC1|ACCOMPLISHED WHAT ROBERT REALLY 
20101222072107.000|20101222072110.000|CC1|WANTED FOR ME, TO HAVE SORT OF A
20101222072110.000|20101222072112.000|CC1|HIT RECORD, BECAUSE ROBERT WAS  
20101222072112.000|20101222072116.000|CC1|JOKING THAT I GOT A LITTLE

20101222072117.000|20101222072119.000|CC1|CERTAINLY CAUGHT UP WITH ME.    
20101222072119.000|20101222072122.000|CC1|I WAS SO HAPPY FOR HIM, REALLY, 
20101222072122.000|20101222072125.000|CC1|BECAUSE HE WANTED THAT FOR ME.  
20101222072125.000|20101222072130.000|CC1|I HAD MY BAND, AND I HAVE A     
20101222072130.000|20101222072131.000|CC1|CERTAIN AMOUNT OF SPACE FOR THE 
20101222072131.000|20101222072133.000|CC1|NEW GUARD.

20101222072135.000|20101222072138.000|CC1|SPACE.                          
20101222072138.000|20101222072140.000|CC1|IT WOULD GIVE PEOPLE SOME THINGS
20101222072140.000|20101222072143.000|CC1|TO THINK ABOUT, AND BETWEEN     
20101222072143.000|20101222072149.000|CC1|"HORSES" AND THE OTHER, I       
20101222072149.000|20101222072150.000|CC1|THOUGHT I HAD DONE MY JOB.      
20101222072150.000|20101222072158.000|CC1|TAVIS: EVERY SONG WRITER THAT   
20101222072158.000|20101222072200.000|CC1|THINKS OF HIMSELF OR HERSELF AS 
20101222072200.000|20101222072204.000|CC1|A POET OF SORTS -- WHAT DO YOU  
20101222072204.000|20101222072205.000|CC1|THINK THAT YOU DID IT UNIQUELY  
20101222072205.000|20101222072206.000|CC1|DIFFERENT?                      
20101222072206.000|20101222072208.000|CC1|WHAT DID YOU DO UNIQUELY        
20101222072208.000|20101222072213.000|CC1|DIFFERENT, PATTI, IN TERMS OF   
20101222072213.000|20101222072215.000|CC1|MARION YOUR POETRY WITH MUSIC --
20101222072215.000|20101222072221.000|CC1|MARRYING YOUR POETRY WITH MUSIC?
20101222072221.000|20101222072225.000|CC1|>> THERE WAS BUILDING AND       
20101222072225.000|20101222072228.000|CC1|KEEPING AND MAINTAINING A SENSE 
20101222072228.000|20101222072232.000|CC1|OF IMPROVISATION.               
20101222072232.000|20101222072235.000|CC1|RIGHT FROM THE START, WE STARTED
20101222072235.000|20101222072238.000|CC1|WORKING WITH RECORDS -- WITH    
20101222072238.000|20101222072243.000|CC1|THREE CHORDS, AND THAT ALLOWED  
20101222072243.000|20101222072249.000|CC1|ME TO EMPRISE -- TO IMPROVISE.  
20101222072249.000|20101222072254.000|CC1|IN "HORSES," THERE IS A LOT OF  
20101222072254.000|20101222072256.000|CC1|IMPROVISATION, AND I HAVE       
20101222072256.000|20101222072257.000|CC1|MAINTAINED THAT RIGHT FROM THE  
20101222072257.000|20101222072259.000|CC1|BEGINNING.                      
20101222072259.000|20101222072301.000|CC1|THERE IS ONE THAT HAD A 14-     
20101222072301.000|20101222072305.000|CC1|MINUTE IN PROPOSITION, WHERE THE
20101222072305.000|20101222072307.000|CC1|LANGUAGE IS COMPLETE IMPROVISED 
20101222072307.000|20101222072325.000|CC1|IN THE STUDIO, "RADIO BAGHDAD." 
20101222072325.000|20101222072326.000|CC1|GIVING ME THE CHANCE TO PRESENT 
20101222072326.000|20101222072328.000|CC1|SONGS LIKE THIS THAT ARE NOT    
20101222072328.000|20101222072330.000|CC1|STRUCTURED, WHERE I USE PEOPLE  
20101222072330.000|20101222072337.000|CC1|LIKE COLTRANE AND JIMI          
20101222072337.000|20101222072340.000|CC1|HENDRIX.                        
20101222072340.000|20101222072342.000|CC1|GOD BLESS SMOKEY ROBINSON.      
20101222072342.000|20101222072344.000|CC1|I DO NOT HAVE HIS GIFT TO WRITE 
20101222072344.000|20101222072346.000|CC1|SONGS LIKE THAT.                
20101222072346.000|20101222072351.000|CC1|BUT I DO HAVE A GIFT TO GO OUT  
20101222072351.000|20101222072356.000|CC1|THERE AND HOPEFULLY SPEAK TO GOD
20101222072356.000|20101222072358.000|CC1|A LITTLE BIT AND GIVE IT TO THE
